description: One of the less popular mechs from the Comstar Command Level II pack, the Sentinel is a medium weight skirmisher. This weeks Mech Overview is taking a look at the different variants.
title: Battletech Mech Overview: Sentinel

description: Hi everyone! A few weeks back, we started to check out all of the different counter spells you can play in Commander that lack the classic counter spell coloring of Blue. You can check that out here if you missed it! Just to reiterate quickly, here are the criteria for cards we’ll be looking at: […]
title: MTG Commander Focus: Rating Blue-Less Counter Spells Part 2

description: The Road continues for TheChirurgeon! Check in as he talks about more Night Lords hobby progress, figuring out the story behind his army for this year's Grand Narrative, and vacation games of Kill Team.
title: TheChirurgeon’s Road Through 2024, Part 25: Vacation Narrative Planning

description: Welcome back, Kill Teamers, to a doozy of a week. If you’ve been living under a rock and missed the news, check out the multitude of articles over on WarCom! 30 minutes of words from the head designer, https://www.warhammer-community.com/2024/08/20/kill-team-lore-whats-the-buzz-around-the-upgraded-vespid-stingwings/ Light vespid dives, https://www.warhammer-community.com/2024/08/20/kill-team-lore-whats-the-buzz-around-the-upgraded-vespid-stingwings/ Reject shapes, embrace imperial units, and some rules teasing, https://www.warhammer-community.com/2024/08/21/inches-and-icons-what-to-expect-from-the-new-edition-of-kill-team/ With all […]
title: This Week in Kill Team: Aug 13-19

description: First off, a big thank you to Annie of Bad Squiddo Games for supplying these minis free of charge to review! The selection of minis on offer there are far beyond the shieldmaidens I’m reviewing today and worth looking at.  We are still knee-deep in Saga Summer here at Goonhammer and if you missed my […]
title: Goonhammer Historicals: Bad Squiddo Shieldmaiden Review and Saga Warband

description: Black Panther is one of the most important characters in Marvel Comics.  I am currently reading the Ta-Nehisi Coates run of the character, and it is some of the best storytelling I have experienced, in any medium, period.  I will cover the lore in a separate Who Is? article, but let’s just say in my […]
title: How To Paint Everything: Marvel Crisis Protocol Black Panther

description: I’ll admit it, I was not a fan of the Star Wars show Rebels when it first aired.  I have, however, given it another chance, and now the story of the Spectres is one of my favorite stories in all of Star Wars lore. When these characters were announced for Shatterpoint, I was very excited […]
title: Star Wars Shatterpoint: Stronger Than Fear Squad Pack Review

description: John from Can You Roll a Crit? is back covering more new news for the next edition of Kill Team! He goes over the new 3 ways to score, the Kill Team app, updated core rules, solo and co-op mode, updated faction rules as well as the removal of all the Compendium kill teams! Have […]
title: CYRAC: Confirmed Changes for the New Edition of Kill Team

description: Howdy scummers! Welcome to an extra, extra, bonus edition of Necromunday. This week, Man of Waaagh stopped by Sump City radio to chat about Squat Prospectors in THE WAR ROOM. Lots of great chat about listbuilding, wargear, and strategies. Tactics chat starts at about 2 hours and 42 minutes into the episode (it is a […]
title: Necromunday – Man Of Waaagh on Sump City Radio
